Package com.atakmap.android.user.geocode

Class GeocodeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.user.geocode.GeocodeManager
  • public class GeocodeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Ability to register a variety of types of Geocoding capabilities via a plugin architecture. Users must implement the Geocode Interface in order to be used.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  GeocodeManager.Geocoder  
      static interface  GeocodeManager.Geocoder2  
      static interface  GeocodeManager.GeocoderChangedListener
      The interface for listening when the default geocoder is changed in the system.
      static class  GeocodeManager.GeocoderException
